LanguageData.LotR_ChunkSlagIron.label: iron slag chunk
LanguageData.LotR_ChunkSlagIron.description: A chunk of iron slag. Not very useful in its current form but it's possible to smelt iron from it.
LanguageData.LotR_Iron.label: iron
LanguageData.LotR_Iron.description: A sturdy natural resource used for building structures, tools, and weapons.
LanguageData.LotR_MineableIron.label: iron ore deposit
LanguageData.LotR_MineableIron.description: Naturally occurring ore deposits. Rich in iron.
LanguageData.LotR_Mithril.label: mithril
LanguageData.LotR_Mithril.description: A feather-light material that resembles silver, yet is stronger and lighter than steel. It is also the rarest material in the known-world, which makes it immensely valuable.
